summary: Makes minor adjustment to weapon perks.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes minor adjustments to four perk trees: Blocking, Two-Handed Weapons, One-Handed Weapons, and Marksmanship.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blocking:
-Deadly Bash, Rank 2: 10X bashing damage
-Elemental Protection, Rank 2: 75% protection from magic when blocking

Marksman:
-Quick Shot, rank 2: 50% faster at notching arrows.

Two-Handed Weapons:
-Champion\'s Stance, rank 2: 35% less stamina for two-handed power attacks
-Champion\'s Stance, rank 3: 50% less stamina for two-handed power attacks

One-Handed Weapons::
-Fighting Stance, rank 2: 35% less stamina for one-handed power attacks
-Fighting Stance, rank 3: 50% less stamina for one-handed power attacks
-Dual Savagery, rank 2: 75% extra damage for dual power attacks
-Dual Flurry, rank 2: 50% faster attack speed for dual wielding (Note: this is VERY fast and may be undesirable for some people)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let me know of any issues or suggestions. Have fun!
author: DeanCarter
